SELECT DATE_FORMAT(a.OPER_DT, '%Y-%m-%d') OPER_DT ,a.REP_ROUT_ID ,b.REP_ROUT_NM ,a.VHC_ID ,b.ROUT_ID ,b.ROUT_NM ,d.COMP_NM ,d.AREA ,(IF(b.USE_YN IS NULL, '', IF(b.USE_YN = 'Y', '노선사용', ''))) AS USE_YN ,e.VHC_NO FROM BRT_CUR_ALLOC_PL_INFO a LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST b ON a.REP_ROUT_ID = b.REP_ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_COMP_CMPSTN c ON b.ROUT_ID = c.ROUT_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_TRANSCOMP_MST d ON c.COMP_ID = d.COMP_ID LEFT JOIN BMS_VHC_MST e ON a.VHC_ID = e.VHC_ID
AND a.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || b.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND a.REP_ROUT_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND b.REP_ROUT_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY a.VHC_ID
SELECT a.REP_ROUT_ID ,b.REP_ROUT_NM FROM BRT_CUR_ALLOC_PL_INFO a LEFT JOIN BMS_ROUT_MST b ON a.REP_ROUT_ID = b.REP_ROUT_ID

select DATE_FORMAT(a.OCR_DTM, '%Y-%m-%d %H:%i:%s') OCR_DTM ,a.NODE_ID ,a.VHC_ID ,a.VIOLT_TYPE ,a.GPS_X ,a.GPS_Y ,a.JUDGE ,a.JUDG_ORG ,a.JUDG_TYPE ,a.JUDG_DESC ,a.ROUT_ID ,a.VHC_NO ,b.NODE_NM from BRT_OPER_VIOLT_HIS a LEFT JOIN BMS_NODE_MST b ON a.NODE_ID = b.NODE_ID where VHC_ID = #{VHC_ID} and ROUT_ID = #{ROUT_ID} ORDER BY a.OCR_DTM

SELECT NODE_ID, NODE_NM FROM BMS_NODE_MST
AND NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%') || NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_ID LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
AND NODE_NM LIKE CONCAT('%',#{CONTENT},'%')
ORDER BY NODE_ID
